item.description:
MeetUp to Rock Climb at MetroRock Gym in Everett. 

If you've never climbed here before, you'll need to take & pass a belay test for rope climbing. If you are not confident you can tie a re-threaded figure-8 knot and double fisherman's backup knot and safely belay a climber using an ATC device, it is highly recommended you take the Level 1 Safety class. The gym will not allow you to climb on ropes without passing a belay test. Call MetroRock or see the website below for more info, and ask them about any discounts or special prices they are offering.

If this is your first time driving here, it can be tricky to find MetroRock Everett. Use a GPS if possible. MetroRock is in a building opposite Boston Coach.

Toprope, sport leading, and bouldering available, including some tall walls up to 55 feet.  Whether you're a new or experienced climber, join us for a fun and solid workout!  Gym meetups are also a great way to make more friends for outdoor climbing.  If you'd like to lead climb, don't forget to bring your rope :)

Full-access Day Pass $18. Bouldering-Only Pass $15. Mondays are Women's Night: Women's Pass $10.  More info and directions: http://www.metrorock.com/

Meet UPSTAIRS in the lounge above the bouldering area (to make it easier to spot the group) from 7 - 7:10 PM.  If arriving later, just come find us on the walls.  Hopefully you can recognize me (see "Event Host") from my picture.  And/or check the small Whiteboard near the bathrooms and water fountain, for a description of what I'm wearing that day.

If interested in starting earlier, give us a heads up in your RSVP comment -- and to help us find and recognize you: Write your name & description on the Whiteboard and make sure you have a face picture posted on your profile.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet UPSTAIRS in the lounge above the bouldering area; Check the Whiteboard at the gym for a description of what our host is wearing (details below).
item.name: MetroRock Monday - meet UPSTAIRS over the bouldering area
